cf001.courseFaqDescription: The program is designed to suit all levels of Data Science expertise. From the fundamentals to the advanced concepts in Data Science, the course covers everything you need to know, whether you’re a novice or an expert. To facilitate development of immediately applicable skills, the training adopts an applied learning approach with instructor-led training, hands-on exercises, projects, and activities.
cf001.courseFaqTitle: I am a novice in Data Science. Is the Data Science with Python Certification Course suitable for me?

cf002.courseFaqDescription: Yes, our Data Science with Python course is designed to offer flexibility for you to upskill as per your convenience. We have both weekday and weekend batches to accommodate your current job.
cf002.courseFaqTitle: Can I pursue this course along with my full-time job?

cf003.courseFaqDescription: In addition to the training hours, we recommend spending about 2 hours every day, for the duration of course.
cf003.courseFaqTitle: How many hours of study will be required every week?

cf004.courseFaqDescription: The program is designed to suit all levels of Data Science expertise. From the fundamentals to the advanced concepts in Data Science, the course covers everything you need to know, whether you’re a novice or an expert. To facilitate development of immediately applicable skills, the training adopts an applied learning approach with instructor-led training, hands-on exercises, projects, and activities.
cf004.courseFaqTitle: I am a novice in Data Science. Is the Data Science with Python Certification Course suitable for me?

cf005.courseFaqDescription: Yes, our Data Science with Python course is designed to offer flexibility for you to upskill as per your convenience. We have both weekday and weekend batches to accommodate your current job.
cf005.courseFaqTitle: Can I pursue this course along with my full-time job?

cf006.courseFaqDescription: In addition to the training hours, we recommend spending about 2 hours every day, for the duration of course.
cf006.courseFaqTitle: How many hours of study will be required every week?

cs001.courseScopeDescription:
Data Science has bagged the top spot in LinkedIn’s Emerging Jobs Report for the last three years. Thousands of companies need team members who can transform data sets into strategic forecasts. Acquire in-demand data science and Python skills and meet that need. 
Data Science and AI have taken the centre-stage as more and more brands realise the possibilities of these tools in the post-COVID world. The demand for data engineers was up 50% and the demand for data scientists was up 32% in 2020 compared to the prior year. The average salary for a data scientist in the U.S. is $96,494 per year and the demand for data scientists is pegged to grow by 16% between 2020 and 2028, a rate that’s faster than the average for all occupations (PayScale). 

Capitalize on the demand for the ‘hottest job of the 21st century’ with a program primed for industry relevance.
